cuts.out_of_context_prompt:
video_1.mp4: context
The message of video_0.mp4 is "This mean leaves his child on the step of the stage."

cuts.out_of_context_answer: Yes, the video is out of context. The video shows Elon Musk walking down the stairs from a stage with a young child, identified as his son "X," who is lagging behind. The original poster is claiming Musk is leaving his child unattended. However, several sources state that the man next to Musk is the boy’s nanny, so the child was not alone, and Musk likely only walked ahead of the pair briefly before getting back to his son.  There is no evidence Musk "left" his son on the stairs.
